sentence.Network_en: It was like nothing so much as the phantasmagoric play of the northern lights.
sentence.Network_cn: 这和北极光的变幻不定极其相似.

PerfectNetExp.abs: phantasmagoria 千变万化的风景phantasmagoric 幻影似的phantasmal 幻影的
phantasmagoric的意思、解释 adj.  1. 幻影似的,变幻不定的phantasmagoric的用法例句 1. Phantasmagoric multicolor light. 多种彩色变化闪烁。 2. Life is.

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by fantastic imagery and incongruous juxtapositions;

sentences.sentence: "the incongruous imagery in surreal art and literature"

auth_sentence.content: Not in his person he was a "big personality," in that odious phrase but in his history, which is partial, almost phantasmagoric.
